alert.note: Alert for Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:05PM MDT until June 12 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR LAWRENCE AND SOUTHEASTERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 605 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cement Ridge Lookout, or 14 miles west of Lead, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Iron Creek Lake, Roughlock Falls, Savoy, Bridal Veil Falls, Cheyenne Crossing, Terry Peak, Spearfish Canyon, Central City, Lead, Deadwood, Brownsville, Galena, Roubaix Lake and Apple Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for west central South Dakota...and northeastern Wyoming.
